Release notes for Kendo UI v2015.1.429

Components

What's fixed

  • kendo.expr can't handle array accessors when safe is true
  • .map files are referencing source files as src/src

AngularJS

What's new

  • k-ng-model support for auto-bind=false option

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • Widget does not show the fixed group header when data source is set dynamically

Chart

What's new

  • Add value, dataItem and culture info to axis labels visual event arguments

What's fixed

  • Notes size option is not applied
  • Axis labels are not entirely visible when custom visual is used.
  • Stacked and stepped area charts drop the last value
  • Tooltip padding doesn't work

ComboBox

What's new

  • MVVM source binding should re-set widget's value
  • Widget should not show selected value on initial loading
  • k-ng-model support for auto-bind=false option
  • MVVM auto-bind = false not obeyed

What's fixed

  • Widget does not select the correct option on initialization
  • Widget does not show the fixed group header when data source is set dynamically
  • Widget does not render the items when autoBind is set to false and source is bound
  • Show custom value when widgets data source is empty
  • Selected item text/dataItem is not updated
  • Virtualization is broken when dataSource is paged and filtered

DataSource

What's fixed

  • Skip wrapping model field getter for XMLReader if already a function
  • Prefetch requests should handle error events

Diagram

What's fixed

  • The change event is not triggered when a connection is added

Draggable

What's fixed

  • DropTargetArea filter is not applied accordingly

Drawing

What's fixed

  • Buggy rendering of Google Maps into PDF/PNG
  • Border-radius too big is rendered wrongfully in PDF/SVG

DropDownList

What's new

  • MVVM source binding should re-set widget's value
  • k-ng-model support for auto-bind=false option
  • MVVM auto-bind = false not obeyed

What's fixed

  • Widget does not select the correct option on initialization
  • Widget does not raise the select event on blur when source is filtered
  • Widget trigger select event with undefined item when autoBind: false is used
  • Widget does not show the fixed group header when data source is set dynamically
  • Widget throws an exception when press ENTER and datasource is empty
  • dataItem method does not return correct dataitem when optionLabel element is passed to the function
  • Selected item text/dataItem is not updated
  • Virtualized list does not show a result on second filtering
  • Virtualization is broken when dataSource is paged and filtered
  • Widget does not autoscroll to selected item in Galaxy S4

Editor

What's fixed

  • Slow editing performance on Android devices

Grid

What's fixed

  • Grid resize method breaks virtual scrolbar if executed too early
  • Conflict between adaptive and responsive styles
  • JS error when navigating out of the grid header

MVVM

What's new

  • MVVM auto-bind = false not obeyed
  • SELECT auto-selects first option, but does not update MVVM binding.

What's fixed

  • Widget does not show the fixed group header when data source is set dynamically

Map

What's fixed

  • HtmlAttributes method doesn't work for the markers

MobileButton

What's fixed

  • data-click-on=down also triggers events on up

MultiSelect

What's new

  • MVVM source binding should re-set widget's value
  • k-ng-model support for auto-bind=false option
  • MultiSelect should render the text of the underlying custom option elements
  • Persist the selected tags on re-bind when returned data does not consist all selected data items
  • MVVM auto-bind = false not obeyed
  • Widget does not remove tags when "X" is pressed in mobile devices

What's fixed

  • Widget does not show the fixed group header when data source is set dynamically
  • Popup closes immediately on open
  • MultiSelect clears selection when click input inside the tag element
  • Selected item text/dataItem is not updated

PDF Export

What's fixed

  • Images missing in PDF export (IE)
  • Auto page breaking in PDF is broken when Bootstrap CSS is included
  • Error when using PDF export with mootools loaded on page

Scheduler

What's fixed

  • Conflict between adaptive and responsive styles
  • TimelineMonth view sets k-nonwork-hour class for all events
  • Change event is not triggered when selecting events using select method

StockChart

What's new

  • Add value, dataItem and culture info to axis labels visual event arguments

What's fixed

  • PlotBands for the navigator axes don't appear
  • Visible: false option of the navigator.categoryAxis.majorTicks does not work

TreeList

What's new

  • Display "null" as blank cell

What's fixed

  • TreeList editor serialization doesn't correctly escape nested widgets
  • Custom command in TreeList toolbar doesn't execute its handler
  • Selection on alt rows is removed on collapse of parent row
  • TreeList commands doesn't prevent default browser action
  • Mixing string and custom commands triggers JS error
  • TreeList expand can be hidden with column menu
  • Can't hide columns when when headerAttributes are set
  • Column headers are not scrolled on mobile devices
